title: alcolyze
text: As the founding designer for Alcolyze, I was at the forefront of developing a personal BAC monitoring system targeting alcohol-related issues like drunk driving and underage drinking. Leveraging innovative blockchain technology for data capture and integrating cutting-edge fuel-cell breathalyzer IoT technology, I contributed to creating Alcolyze's robust and versatile platform, setting a new benchmark for prevention programs in this space.

slides.bottomText: This showcase highlights our roadmap for the Security Design team's strategic development in FY24, meticulously designed to meet our business and organizational goals.

I was tasked with streamlining a lengthy document to fit slide formats, transforming the text into bullet points in accordance with Cisco guidelines. Simplified intricate concepts into engaging visuals.
While adhering to Cisco's guidelines, I also had the flexibility to design custom graphics that aligned with the visions of C-suite leadership without veering too far off course.

slides.text: I truly enjoyed my time at WMG, surrounded by a high caliber of designers and research gurus. The team was fantastic and fun to work with. Interested in this or other projects I've been a part of? I'd be happy to chat.
